text: The 2017 ICC World Cricket League Africa Region Qualifiers is an international cricket tournament that is scheduled to take place in Benoni, South Africa. The winner of the qualifiers will progress to ICC WCL Division 5 which will be staged in September 2017. == Teams == Six teams invited by ICC for the tournament: * * * * * * == Points table == {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- !width=200 |Team !width=30 abbr="Played" |P !width=30 abbr="Won" |W !width=30 abbr="Lost" |L !width=30 abbr="Tied" |T !width=30 abbr="No result" |NR !width=60 |Points !width=60 abbr="Net run rate" |NRR !width=417 |Status |-style="background: #D0F0C0;" | align="left" | || 5 || 5 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 10 || +1.994 || rowspan=1| Qualify for 2017 ICC World Cricket League Division Five |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 5 || 3 || 1 || 0 || 1 || 7 || +0.420 || rowspan=5| Did not Qualify for 2017 ICC World Cricket League Division Five |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 5 || 3 || 2 || 0 || 0 || 6 || +1.127 |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 5 || 2 || 2 || 0 || 1 || 5 || -0.704 |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 5 || 1 || 4 || 0 || 0 || 2 || -0.770 |-style="background: #FF8888;" | align="left" | || 5 || 0 || 5 || 0 || 0 || 0 || -1.942 |} Source: Cricinfo ==Fixtures== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == References == Category:2017–19 ICC World Cricket League Category:2017 in cricket
title: 2017 ICC World Cricket League Africa Region Qualifiers
